resources.string: 1. The clock resets to 00:00:00 when you start a \n\t\tNew Game. Tally resets to 25.
2. When you click Start, the stop watch starts \n\t\tticking. It pauses when you click Stop and \n\t\tresumes when you click Start again.
3. Whenever you Stop the Clock, the Tally gets \n\t\tupdated.

4. When you stop, if the number represented by 
		the last 2 digits (milliseconds) is a multiple 
		of 25, your Tally gets increased by that 
		multiplier. If the last two digits are 00, your 
		Tally gets increased by 4. Otherwise, your 
		Tally will be decreased by the number you 
		are off from the closest multiplier of 25.
5. Score gets incremented by 1 each time you \n\t\tStop without making the tally 0. The game \n\t\tends when your Tally reaches 0.
